```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
from inspect_viz import (
    reactive_df, select, param, 
    menu_input, slider_input, 
    figure_view, table_view
)

# parameters
petal_width = param(2.5)
petal_length = param(7)

# data source
df = reactive_df(px.data.iris()).query(f"""
    SELECT * FROM df 
    WHERE petal_width < {petal_width} AND petal_length < {petal_length}
""")
```


## Row {.toolbar}

```{python}
menu_input(df, column="species")
slider_input(df, column="petal_width", param=petal_width)
slider_input(df, column="petal_length", param=petal_length)
```

## Row 

### Column

```{python}
fig = px.scatter(df, x="sepal_width", y="sepal_length")
figure_view(df, fig)
```

```{python}
table_view(df)
```
